TopicTitle: Picture won't add to my sig?

Articles.Content: Hello! I'm trying to add an image to my sig. When I click preview sig it's there, but then I check my posts and it's not. Anyone know what would be causing this?
I presume you've uploaded this image to a third-party image host like imgur?
Yes, I'm trying to get the Pre-November Forum Update badge to my sig.
Could you post your image here?

I think I've figured out the problem.

Each post's signature area has a height limit, and anything beyond that gets hidden. So your second image is there, but you can't actually see it.

The only suggestion I can make is for you to rearrange everything in your signature block to not take up so many lines.
Thanks for taking your time to help!

(rescale img(s) and use [table] tag could help) Edited November 27, 2015 by WinkAllKerb''
